contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has Severe Combined Immunodeficiency [SCID].
Do not vaccinate if the patient has intussusception.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.

contraindication.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Rotavirus
contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Rotavirus vaccine.
Do not vaccinate with Rotarix if the patient has an allergy to latex.

series.seriesName: Rotavirus late start at 15 weeks 3-dose series
Rotavirus late start at 15 weeks 2-dose series
